name: Survcraft
description:
Survcraft is a stylistic survival game designed for survival. Your aim in the game is to collect the most materials, get stronger and survive in nature. But you must be careful while experiencing all this, you may be attacked by rival clans or wild animals.

Explore

Design

Dig

Build



Our game is currently in early access stage.
We wanted to release our game as early access because there are many features we need to add to our game.

available features

stylistic graphics
day and night cycle
building system
optimized graphics
graphics setting menu
smooth graphics
various types of structures

Keyboard Controls

WASD: Move
E: Build / Interact
Q: Build menu
1: Axe
2: Pickaxe
3: Hammer
RMB: Hammer Menu
Save Buildings: 8
Load Buildings: 9
P: Settings

Controller Controls

Right Stick: Move
Left Stick: Look
X / Square: Build / Interact
D-Pad UP: Axe
D-Pad Right: Pickaxe
D-Pad Down: Hammer
Y / Triangle: Hammer Menu
Menu Button: Settings

We are waiting for your feedback and suggestions about our game.
